wikipedia_page.main: Frank Farmer OBE (18 September 1912 – 16 July 2004) was an English physicist, and a pioneer in the application of physics to medicine, particularly in relation to the practical aspects of cancer treatment by radiation.

response: * Frank Farmer (1912–2004), physicist, pioneer in developing medical applications for physics, born in Bexleyheath
